title: Transcription factor network gets to heart of wood formation

title_detail.value: Transcription factor network gets to heart of wood formation

summary: Research on high-level switches that control wood formation has applications in timber, paper and biofuels, as well as making forests healthier.

summary_detail.value: Research on high-level switches that control wood formation has applications in timber, paper and biofuels, as well as making forests healthier.
